name: BUY the Chest from the Shaman in Land's End Underground
DEFEAT King Calamari, Megasmilax, or Culex
SLEEP in the Suite and TIP the Bellhop
OPEN the Teeter-Totter Chest in Booster Tower
DEFEAT a Troopa and Heavy Troopa of the SAME Color
HAVE your Fortune Told
FINISH as SMB1 Mario
OPEN the Chest above the swings in Rose Way
DEFEAT Jinx twice
WEAR a Lazy Shell set
SELL 6 DIFFERENT types of Mushroom
OBTAIN 3 Star Pieces
FINISH with over 1000 Coins
SELL a Safety Badge AND Safety Ring
DEFEAT 2+ DIFFERENT colors of Fire Elemental
FINISH with more than 50 FP
LISTEN to a Retro SMB or SMW Tune
HAVE your entire Party affected by the same Status Effect
DEFEAT Dodo BEFORE Valentina
STUN Croco1 or Mack
WIN all 3 Crook battles in Moleville Mines
READ 7 wishes on Star Hill
WIN the maximum Sky Bridge reward on any difficulty
SELL a Super Suit OR an Attack Scarf
DONATE the Seed AND/OR Fertilizer
